segments.source_content:
---
sidebar_label: Client API
---
# Docusaurus Client API
Docusaurus provides some APIs on the clients that can be helpful to you when building your site.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 提供了一些客戶端 API，在構建網站時可能對您有所幫助。

segments.source_content: ## Components {#components}
### `<ErrorBoundary />` {#errorboundary}
This component creates a [React error boundary](https://reactjs.org/docs/error-boundaries.html).

translations.zh-hant: 此組件創建了一個 [React 錯誤邊界](https://reactjs.org/docs/error-boundaries.html)。

segments.source_content: Use it to wrap components that might throw, and display a fallback when that happens instead of crashing the whole app.

translations.zh-hant: 用它來包裹可能拋出錯誤的組件，並在發生錯誤時顯示後備內容，而不是導致整個應用程序崩潰。

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
import ErrorBoundaryTestButton from '@site/src/components/ErrorBoundaryTestButton'
```

:::tip

To see it in action, click here: <ErrorBoundaryTestButton/>

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

要查看實際效果，請點擊這裡：<ErrorBoundaryTestButton/>

:::

segments.source_content:
:::info

Docusaurus uses this component to catch errors within the theme's layout, and also within the entire app.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

Docusaurus 使用此組件來捕獲主題佈局內的錯誤，以及整個應用程序內的錯誤。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::note

This component doesn't catch build-time errors and only protects against client-side render errors that can happen when using stateful React components.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

此組件不會捕獲構建時錯誤，僅保護客戶端渲染錯誤，這些錯誤可能在使用有狀態的 React 組件時發生。

:::

segments.source_content: #### Props {#errorboundary-props}

- `fallback`: an optional render callback returning a JSX element. It will receive an object with 2 attributes: `error`, the error that was caught, and `tryAgain`, a function (`() => void`) callback to reset the error in the component and try rendering it again. If not present, `@theme/Error` will be rendered instead. `@theme/Error` is used for the error boundaries wrapping the site, above the layout.

translations.zh-hant: - `fallback`: 可選的渲染回調函數，返回一個 JSX 元素。它將接收一個包含 2 個屬性的對象：`error`，捕獲到的錯誤，以及 `tryAgain`，一個函數 (`() => void`) 回調，用於重置組件中的錯誤並嘗試重新渲染。如果未提供，則將渲染 `@theme/Error` 代替。`@theme/Error` 用於包裹站點的錯誤邊界，位於佈局之上。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

The `fallback` prop is a callback, and **not a React functional component**. You can't use React hooks inside this callback.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

`fallback` 屬性是一個回調函數，**而不是一個 React 函數組件**。您不能在此回調中使用 React hooks。

:::

segments.source_content: ### `<Head/>` {#head}

This reusable React component will manage all of your changes to the document head. It takes plain HTML tags and outputs plain HTML tags and is beginner-friendly. It is a wrapper around [React Helmet](https://github.com/nfl/react-helmet).

translations.zh-hant: 這個可重用的 React 組件將管理您對文檔頭部的所有更改。它接受純 HTML 標籤並輸出純 HTML 標籤，對初學者友好。它是 [React Helmet](https://github.com/nfl/react-helmet) 的封裝。

segments.source_content: Usage Example:
Nested or latter components will override duplicate usages:

translations.zh-hant: 嵌套或後面的組件將覆蓋重複的使用：

segments.source_content:
```jsx
<Parent>
  {/* highlight-start */}
  <Head>
    <title>My Title</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Helmet application" />
  </Head>
  {/* highlight-end */}
  <Child>
    {/* highlight-start */}
    <Head>
      <title>Nested Title</title>
      <meta name="description" content="Nested component" />
    </Head>
    {/* highlight-end */}
  </Child>
</Parent>
```
Outputs:

```html
<head>
  <title>Nested Title</title>
  <meta name="description" content="Nested component" />
</head>
```
### `<Link/>` {#link}

This component enables linking to internal pages as well as a powerful performance feature called preloading. Preloading is used to prefetch resources so that the resources are fetched by the time the user navigates with this component. We use an `IntersectionObserver` to fetch a low-priority request when the `<Link>` is in the viewport and then use an `onMouseOver` event to trigger a high-priority request when it is likely that a user will navigate to the requested resource.

translations.zh-hant: 此組件支持鏈接到內部頁面，並提供了一個強大的性能功能稱為預加載。預加載用於預取資源，以便用戶通過此組件導航時資源已經被獲取。我們使用 `IntersectionObserver` 在 `<Link>` 進入視口時發起低優先級請求，然後使用 `onMouseOver` 事件在用戶可能導航到請求的資源時觸發高優先級請求。

segments.source_content: The component is a wrapper around react-router’s `<Link>` component that adds useful enhancements specific to Docusaurus. All props are passed through to react-router’s `<Link>` component.

translations.zh-hant: 該組件是 react-router 的 `<Link>` 組件的封裝，添加了特定於 Docusaurus 的有用增強功能。所有屬性都會傳遞給 react-router 的 `<Link>` 組件。

segments.source_content: External links also work, and automatically have these props: `target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"`.

translations.zh-hant: 外部鏈接同樣適用，並自動具有這些屬性：`target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"`。

segments.source_content: #### `to`: string {#to-string}
The target location to navigate to. Example: `/docs/introduction`.

translations.zh-hant: 要導航到的目標位置。例如：`/docs/introduction`。

segments.source_content:
```jsx
<Link to="/courses" />
```

:::tip

Prefer this component to vanilla `<a>` tags because Docusaurus does a lot of optimizations (e.g. broken path detection, prefetching, applying base URL...) if you use `<Link>`.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

相比普通的 `<a>` 標籤，更推薦使用此組件，因為 Docusaurus 做了許多優化（例如檢測錯誤路徑、預取、應用基礎 URL 等）。

:::

segments.source_content: ### `<Redirect/>` {#redirect}

Rendering a `<Redirect>` will navigate to a new location. The new location will override the current location in the history stack like server-side redirects (HTTP 3xx) do. You can refer to [React Router's Redirect documentation](https://reacttraining.com/react-router/web/api/Redirect) for more info on available props.

translations.zh-hant: 渲染 `<Redirect>` 將導航到新位置。新位置將像服務器端重定向（HTTP 3xx）那樣覆蓋歷史堆棧中的當前位置。您可以參考 [React Router 的 Redirect 文檔](https://reacttraining.com/react-router/web/api/Redirect) 獲取更多關於可用屬性的信息。

segments.source_content: Example usage:

:::note

`@docusaurus/router` implements [React Router](https://reacttraining.com/react-router/web/guides/quick-start) and supports its features.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

`@docusaurus/router` 實作了 [React Router](https://reacttraining.com/react-router/web/guides/quick-start) 並支援其功能。

:::

segments.source_content: ### `<BrowserOnly/>` {#browseronly}
The `<BrowserOnly>` component permits to render React components only in the browser after the React app has hydrated.

translations.zh-hant: `<BrowserOnly>` 元件允許在瀏覽器中，當 React 應用完成水合（hydration）後才渲染 React 元件。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use it for integrating with code that can't run in Node.js, because the `window` or `document` objects are being accessed.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

當需要整合無法在 Node.js 環境運行的程式碼時（例如存取 `window` 或 `document` 物件），請使用此元件。

:::

segments.source_content: #### Props {#browseronly-props}

- `children`: render function prop returning browser-only JSX. Will not be executed in Node.js
- `fallback` (optional): JSX to render on the server (Node.js) and until React hydration completes.

translations.zh-hant:
- `children`: 渲染函式屬性，返回僅在瀏覽器中運行的 JSX。在 Node.js 中不會執行。
- `fallback` (選填): 在伺服器端（Node.js）和 React 水合完成前渲染的 JSX。

segments.source_content: #### Example with code {#browseronly-example-code}
#### Example with a library {#browseronly-example-library}
### `<Interpolate/>` {#interpolate}
A simple interpolation component for text containing dynamic placeholders.

translations.zh-hant: 一個簡單的插值元件，用於處理包含動態佔位符的文字。

segments.source_content: The placeholders will be replaced with the provided dynamic values and JSX elements of your choice (strings, links, styled elements...).

translations.zh-hant: 佔位符將被替換為提供的動態值和您選擇的 JSX 元素（字串、連結、樣式化元素等）。

segments.source_content: #### Props {#interpolate-props}

- `children`: text containing interpolation placeholders like `{placeholderName}`
- `values`: object containing interpolation placeholder values

translations.zh-hant:
- `children`: 包含插值佔位符的文字，例如 `{placeholderName}`
- `values`: 包含插值佔位符值的物件

segments.source_content: ### `<Translate/>` {#translate}

When [localizing your site](./i18n/i18n-introduction.mdx), the `<Translate/>` component will allow providing **translation support to React components**, such as your homepage. The `<Translate>` component supports [interpolation](#interpolate).

translations.zh-hant: 當[本地化您的網站](./i18n/i18n-introduction.mdx)時，`<Translate/>` 元件將為 React 元件（例如首頁）提供**翻譯支援**。`<Translate>` 元件支援[插值功能](#interpolate)。

segments.source_content: The translation strings will statically extracted from your code with the [`docusaurus write-translations`](./cli.mdx#docusaurus-write-translations-sitedir) CLI and a `code.json` translation file will be created in `website/i18n/[locale]`.

translations.zh-hant: 翻譯字串將透過 [`docusaurus write-translations`](./cli.mdx#docusaurus-write-translations-sitedir) CLI 從您的程式碼中靜態提取，並在 `website/i18n/[locale]` 中建立一個 `code.json` 翻譯檔案。

segments.source_content:
:::note

The `<Translate/>` props **must be hardcoded strings**.

Apart from the `values` prop used for interpolation, it is **not possible to use variables**, or the static extraction wouldn't work.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

`<Translate/>` 的屬性**必須是硬編碼的字串**。

除了用於插值的 `values` 屬性外，**無法使用變數**，否則靜態提取將無法運作。

:::

segments.source_content: #### Props {#translate-props}

- `children`: untranslated string in the default site locale (can contain [interpolation placeholders](#interpolate))
- `id`: optional value to be used as the key in JSON translation files
- `description`: optional text to help the translator
- `values`: optional object containing interpolation placeholder values

translations.zh-hant:
- `children`: 預設網站語言環境中的未翻譯字串（可包含[插值佔位符](#interpolate)）
- `id`: 選填值，用作 JSON 翻譯檔案中的鍵
- `description`: 選填文字，協助翻譯人員
- `values`: 選填物件，包含插值佔位符值

segments.source_content: #### Example {#example}

:::note

You can even omit the children prop and specify a translation string in your `code.json` file manually after running the `docusaurus write-translations` CLI command.

```jsx
<Translate id="homepage.title" />
```

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

您甚至可以省略 children 屬性，並在執行 `docusaurus write-translations` CLI 命令後，手動在 `code.json` 檔案中指定翻譯字串。

```jsx
<Translate id="homepage.title" />
```

:::

segments.source_content:
:::info

The `<Translate>` component supports interpolation. You can also implement [string pluralization](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/i18n/i18n-tutorial.mdx#pluralization) through some custom code and the [`translate` imperative API](#translate-imperative).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

`<Translate>` 元件支援插值。您也可以透過自訂程式碼和[命令式 `translate` API](#translate-imperative) 來實作[字串複數化](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/i18n/i18n-tutorial.mdx#pluralization)。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Hooks {#hooks}
### `useDocusaurusContext` {#useDocusaurusContext}
React hook to access Docusaurus Context. The context contains the `siteConfig` object from [docusaurus.config.js](api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx) and some additional site metadata.

translations.zh-hant: 用於存取 Docusaurus 上下文的 React 鉤子。上下文包含來自 [docusaurus.config.js](api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx) 的 `siteConfig` 物件和一些額外的網站元資料。

segments.source_content: Usage example:

:::note

The `siteConfig` object only contains **serializable values** (values that are preserved after `JSON.stringify()`). Functions, regexes, etc. would be lost on the client side.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

`siteConfig` 物件僅包含**可序列化的值**（即經過 `JSON.stringify()` 後仍保留的值）。函數、正則表達式等內容會在客戶端丟失。

:::

segments.source_content: ### `useIsBrowser` {#useIsBrowser}
Returns `true` when the React app has successfully hydrated in the browser.

translations.zh-hant: 當 React 應用在瀏覽器中完成水合（hydration）時返回 `true`。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Use this hook instead of `typeof windows !== 'undefined'` in React rendering logic.

The first client-side render output (in the browser) **must be exactly the same** as the server-side render output (Node.js). Not following this rule can lead to unexpected hydration behaviors, as described in [The Perils of Rehydration](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/react/the-perils-of-rehydration/).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

在 React 渲染邏輯中應使用此鉤子而非 `typeof windows !== 'undefined'`。

客戶端首次渲染輸出（瀏覽器端）**必須與**伺服器端渲染輸出（Node.js 端）**完全一致**。違反此規則可能導致不可預期的水合行為，詳見 [The Perils of Rehydration](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/react/the-perils-of-rehydration/)。

:::

segments.source_content: Usage example:
### `useBaseUrl` {#useBaseUrl}
React hook to prepend your site `baseUrl` to a string.

translations.zh-hant: 用於在字串前附加站點 `baseUrl` 的 React 鉤子。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

**Don't use it for regular links!**

The `/baseUrl/` prefix is automatically added to all **absolute paths** by default:

- Markdown: `[link](/my/path)` will link to `/baseUrl/my/path`
- React: `<Link to="/my/path/">link</Link>` will link to `/baseUrl/my/path`

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

**勿用於常規連結！**

所有**絕對路徑**預設會自動添加 `/baseUrl/` 前綴：

- Markdown：`[link](/my/path)` 會指向 `/baseUrl/my/path`
- React：`<Link to="/my/path/">link</Link>` 會指向 `/baseUrl/my/path`

:::

segments.source_content: #### Options {#options}
#### Example usage: {#example-usage}
:::tip In most cases, you don't need `useBaseUrl`. Prefer a `require()` call for [assets](./guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-assets.mdx): ```jsx ``` :::

translations.zh-hant: :::tip 多數情況下無需使用 `useBaseUrl`。 對於[靜態資源](./guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-assets.mdx)，建議改用 `require()`： ```jsx ``` :::

segments.source_content: ### `useBaseUrlUtils` {#useBaseUrlUtils}
Sometimes `useBaseUrl` is not good enough. This hook return additional utils related to your site's base URL.

translations.zh-hant: 當 `useBaseUrl` 無法滿足需求時，此鉤子提供與站點基礎 URL 相關的額外工具函數。

segments.source_content: - `withBaseUrl`: useful if you need to add base URLs to multiple URLs at once.

translations.zh-hant: - `withBaseUrl`：需同時為多個 URL 添加基礎 URL 時特別有用。

segments.source_content: ### `useGlobalData` {#useGlobalData}
React hook to access Docusaurus global data created by all the plugins.

translations.zh-hant: 用於存取所有插件創建的 Docusaurus 全域資料的 React 鉤子。

segments.source_content: Global data is namespaced by plugin name then by plugin ID.

translations.zh-hant: 全域資料按插件名稱和插件 ID 進行命名空間劃分。

segments.source_content:
:::info

Plugin ID is only useful when a plugin is used multiple times on the same site. Each plugin instance is able to create its own global data.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

插件 ID 僅在單個插件被多次用於同一站點時有意義。每個插件實例可創建自己的全域資料。

:::

segments.source_content:
```ts
type GlobalData = Record<
  PluginName,
  Record<
    PluginId, // "default" by default
    any // plugin-specific data
  >
>;
```
Usage example:

:::tip

Inspect your site's global data at `.docusaurus/globalData.json`

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

可透過 `.docusaurus/globalData.json` 檢視站點的全域資料

:::

segments.source_content: ### `usePluginData` {#usePluginData}
Access global data created by a specific plugin instance.

translations.zh-hant: 存取特定插件實例創建的全域資料。

segments.source_content: This is the most convenient hook to access plugin global data and should be used most of the time.

translations.zh-hant: 此為存取插件全域資料最便捷的鉤子，建議優先使用。

segments.source_content: `pluginId` is optional if you don't use multi-instance plugins.

translations.zh-hant: 若不使用多實例插件，`pluginId` 可省略。

segments.source_content: Usage example:
### `useAllPluginInstancesData` {#useAllPluginInstancesData}
Access global data created by a specific plugin. Given a plugin name, it returns the data of all the plugins instances of that name, by plugin id.

translations.zh-hant: 存取特定插件創建的全域資料。根據插件名稱返回該插件所有實例的資料（按插件 ID 分類）。

segments.source_content: Usage example:
### `useBrokenLinks` {#useBrokenLinks}
React hook to access the Docusaurus broken link checker APIs, exposing a way for a Docusaurus pages to report and collect their links and anchors.

translations.zh-hant: 用於存取 Docusaurus 斷鏈檢查 API 的 React Hook，提供方式讓 Docusaurus 頁面回報並收集其連結與錨點。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

This is an **advanced** API that **most Docusaurus users don't need to use directly**.

It is already **built-in** in existing high-level components:

- the [`<Link>`](#link) component will collect links for you
- the `@theme/Heading` (used for Markdown headings) will collect anchors

Use `useBrokenLinks()` if you implement your own `<Heading>` or `<Link>` component.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

這是**進階** API，**大多數 Docusaurus 使用者無需直接使用**。

它已**內建**在現有的高階元件中：

- [`<Link>`](#link) 元件會自動收集連結
- `@theme/Heading` (用於 Markdown 標題) 會自動收集錨點

僅在實作自訂 `<Heading>` 或 `<Link>` 元件時才需使用 `useBrokenLinks()`。

:::

segments.source_content: Usage example:
## Functions {#functions}
### `interpolate` {#interpolate-1}
The imperative counterpart of the [`<Interpolate>`](#interpolate) component.

translations.zh-hant: [`<Interpolate>`](#interpolate) 元件的命令式對應方法。

segments.source_content: #### Signature {#signature}
#### Example {#example-1}
### `translate` {#translate-imperative}
The imperative counterpart of the [`<Translate>`](#translate) component. Also supporting [placeholders interpolation](#interpolate).

translations.zh-hant: [`<Translate>`](#translate) 元件的命令式對應方法。同時支援[佔位符插值](#interpolate)。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use the imperative API for the **rare cases** where a **component cannot be used**, such as:

- the page `title` metadata
- the `placeholder` props of form inputs
- the `aria-label` props for accessibility

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

僅在**無法使用元件**的**特殊情況**下使用命令式 API，例如：

- 頁面 `title` 元數據
- 表單輸入的 `placeholder` 屬性
- 無障礙功能的 `aria-label` 屬性

:::

segments.source_content: #### Signature {#signature-1}
#### Example {#example-2}
## Modules {#modules}
### `ExecutionEnvironment` {#executionenvironment}
A module that exposes a few boolean variables to check the current rendering environment.

translations.zh-hant: 此模組提供若干布林變數用以檢查當前渲染環境。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

For React rendering logic, use [`useIsBrowser()`](#useIsBrowser) or [`<BrowserOnly>`](#browseronly) instead.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

針對 React 渲染邏輯，請改用 [`useIsBrowser()`](#useIsBrowser) 或 [`<BrowserOnly>`](#browseronly)。

:::

segments.source_content: Example:

| Field | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `ExecutionEnvironment.canUseDOM` | `true` if on client/browser, `false` on Node.js/prerendering. |
| `ExecutionEnvironment.canUseEventListeners` | `true` if on client and has `window.addEventListener`. |
| `ExecutionEnvironment.canUseIntersectionObserver` | `true` if on client and has `IntersectionObserver`. |
| `ExecutionEnvironment.canUseViewport` | `true` if on client and has `window.screen`. |
### `constants` {#constants}
A module exposing useful constants to client-side theme code.

translations.zh-hant: 此模組向客戶端主題程式碼公開實用常數。

segments.source_content:
| Named export        | Value     |
| ------------------- | --------- |
| `DEFAULT_PLUGIN_ID` | `default` |
